overview:
Hailing from the Northeast, originally from Providence, RI and residing in Philadelphia, PA, Jenna has been in the digital world for over a decade. Upon graduating from Wesleyan University, she has worked in the digital industry with The New York Press and Getty Images. Jenna is currently the driving force behind the Philadelphia launch of LevelUp.

Jenna is managing a combo team of sales, marketing and implementation specialists. LevelUp, a mobile payment platform and digital loyalty program started in Boston and Philly in July 2011 and has now expanded to over 30 cities country-wide.

The LevelUp mobile payment ecosystem has grown by over 3,750 merchants in 2012, processing over $1.5MM in transactions each month.

web_presences.title: Jenna Flateman Posner's Huffington Post Profile
